title: La Chandelle Apts...Gorgeous Newly Remodeled Studio..Hardwood Floors!
posting_body: ['La Chandelle is a charming, Art Deco building.', 'The unit has been renovated to provide a stylish urban living space right between Mid-Wilshire and Koreatown.', 'This renovated apartment offers refinished hardwood flooring, exposed brick walls, new appliances, SS Refrigerators, quartz countertops, designer light fixtures, ceiling fans, and pedestal sinks, among other improvements.', "La Chandelle is located minutes away from the developing center of Koreatown - a strategic location proximate to some of the region' s largest employer hubs and educational institutions and offering residents a dynamic live-work-play urban environment, with immediate access to the area' s top restaurants, world class shopping, and premier entertainment venues.", 'Residents benefit from their proximity to public transit including multiple bus lines and two Metro Stations.', 'Professionally managed by Statewide Enterprises, Inc. (A+ rated by the Better Business Bureau).', 'Pictures in this ad are a representation and may not reflect the actual apartment that is currently available.', 'To view virtual tour of unit 434 - Studio - <URL>', 'To view virtual tour of unit 327 - Studio - <URL>', '-Quoted security deposit is on approved credit.', '-6 or 12 month lease - Six month lease available with $200 surcharge.', 'The rent, deposit, concession and terms listed in this ad are only valid for the actual date that this ad was initially posted.']
